title: Survived To Love
description: What would you do if you managed to survive an addiction, a cancer, and a hurricane? Ed H chose to grab the zip line with both hands and swing through the jungle of life. He moves fast, and he moves at the drop of a hat. His zest for life is evident in these pages. Read it and see. Ed is candid about his fall to the "bottom" and vivid in his words of recovery and challenge. Walk with him...No, run with him through this, the race of his life - past alcoholism, past cancer, past Katrina. Ed is not one to sit still, and he takes his story of hope to every need he sees. Included in the text are a couple of road signs to help navigate the turns and twists of Ed's journey. Fasten your seat belts. You are about to enter the vroom-vroom whoosh world of Ed H. This is Ed's story of survival and recovery. It is his way of reaching out to those who still suffer.
author: Ed H
